extension-param.param-value: style:#site-translate-header-wrapper{width:100% !important; height:44px; position: fixed; top:0;}#site-translate-header-wrapper p{font-size:10px;line-height: 12px;}#site-translate-message{display:table-cell; height:44px; vertical-align:middle; width:5000px;} body:not(.home) header { top: 44px; } #sp_header { top: 48px; } #container { margin: 44px 0 0; } header .reserve .txt:lang(en) { padding: 0 5px 0 0; } .gnavi .list .child .link:lang(en) { padding: 0 25px; font-size: 84%; } footer .sitemap .links .child { font-size: 80%; } .top_access .traffic2 .btns a:first-child { padding: 0 20px !important;} .top_access .txtarea .access th { width: 40%; } .dining1 .dining1_wrap .ttl:lang(en) { width: 25%; } footer .reserve .logo:lang(en) { padding: 0 20px 0 0; } footer .reserve .tel .label { letter-spacing: normal; } .caption_ttl:lang(en) { font-size: 17.5px;} .hw.large { margin: 20px auto 30px } .label_dl dt { width: 80px; display: block; } .label_dl dd { display: block; font-size: 95%; padding: 5px 0; } .btns { margin: 90px 0 50px; } .tate:lang(en) { writing-mode: inherit; -ms-writing-mode: lr-tb; -webkit-writing-mode: inherit; } .top_about:lang(en) { height: auto; padding: 1% 0; margin: 0; } .top_about .txtarea:lang(en) { position: inherit; top:0; height: auto; width: 800px; } .subnavi .list .child:lang(en) { line-height: 1.3 } .top_info .hw .main:lang(en) { white-space: normal; } #sp_header .tel { top: 0; height: auto; width: 170px; } .top_about .txtarea .hw:lang(en) { float: right; } @media screen and (min-width: 781px) { body:not(.home) .gnavi { top: 100px; font-size: 90%; } .top_plan .ttl { font-size: 48px;letter-spacing: normal; padding: 20px 0 0 10px; } .top_plan .data_num:lang(en) { font-size: 18px; } .top_plan .cruiser .hover { padding: 25px 0 0; } .top_plan .yakatabune .hw:lang(en) { width: auto; }} @media screen and (max-width: 780px) { #site-translate-header-wrapper p { text-align: left; padding: 0 3%;} .gnavi { top: 49px;} .gnavi .list .child .link:lang(en) { padding: 20px; } .gnavi .list .child .close { margin: 0 0 49px; } body:not(.home) .gnavi { top: 49px; } .top_about:lang(en) { padding: 30px 15px 60px;} .anchor .anchor_list .child .link:lang(en) { line-height: 1.2; } .top_about .txtarea .hw:lang(en) { float: none; } .top_about:lang(en) { position: static; } .top_about .txtarea:lang(en) { width: auto; }}
